name: Argomotion
description:
In development - portfolio piece

Engine: Unreal Engine 4.26.2

Textures: Made with adobe Photoshop

Models: Made with Autodesk 3Ds MAX 2021

Animations/Rigging: Made with Autodesk 3dS Max 2021

Welcome to Argomotion, 

A third person exploration game set on a graveyard planet filled with wreckage and obstacles. You control the Argonautilus, an astronaut returning to his home planet finding it in ruin. Navigate through the wreckage of the spaceship graveyard as you dodge hostile drones and environmental hazards on your way towards the gravity core.


Special thanks to:

Jax Martin

Robert Currie

Eric Legault

Julien Bernier
